    • 方法详细资料

      • nextID

        public static int nextID(int low,
                         int high)
        generate random id
        参数:
        low - lower bound of random number
        high - higher bound of random number
        返回:
        random number between higher and lower bound
        抛出:

      • validDate

        public static boolean validDate(java.lang.String string)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        参数:
        string - lower bound of random number
        返回:
        random number between higher and lower bound
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
